mapper.select: SELECT seq, groupList, number, mainP, contactMain_seq FROM phone WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, groupList, number, mainP, contactMain_seq FROM phone WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO phone ( number, contactMain_seq ) VALUES ( #{number}, 1 )
SELECT last_insert_id()
